name: Speed Race (Channel F)
description:
First Released:  October 15th 2022

One Player only game.

A port of the 1974 arcade game Speed Race, weave through cars on the track in the set time limit. Score counts up the faster you go, but hitting other cars or the side will grind you to a halt and lose you time.

Two versions for this game, one for using a traditional D-pad - speedraced.bin
The other is for those with the ability to play with real Channel F Controllers, using twist functions - speedracet.bin

Use forward for speeding up, backward for slowing down. Pulling up on the attraction screen will load the last difficulty (default 3 cars). Pressing Console buttons during attraction screen will change difficulty. Button number corresponds to number of cars.

Instruction booklet included for additional help and giggles.
